verbs.description: [ARG0: Donald Trump ’s fixer Michael Cohen] [V: received] [ARG1: a million dollars] [ARG2: from New York firm Columbus Nova] . That firm is linked to Russian oligarch Viktor Vekselberg , who met with Cohen in Trump Tower .
Donald Trump ’s fixer Michael Cohen received a million dollars from New York firm Columbus Nova . That firm [V: is] linked to Russian oligarch Viktor Vekselberg , who met with Cohen in Trump Tower .

Donald Trump ’s fixer Michael Cohen received a million dollars from New York firm Columbus Nova . [ARG1: That firm] is [V: linked] [ARG2: to Russian oligarch Viktor Vekselberg , who met with Cohen in Trump Tower] .

Donald Trump ’s fixer Michael Cohen received a million dollars from New York firm Columbus Nova . That firm is linked to [ARG0: Russian oligarch Viktor Vekselberg] , [R-ARG0: who] [V: met] [ARG1: with Cohen] [ARGM-LOC: in Trump Tower] .
